title: 服务器木牌为什么没法输入彩色字体&
author: carly77886
txt_content: 服务器木牌为什么没法输入彩色字体&

replies.author: EterLzb
replies.txt_content:
Ess插件配置文件中
enabledSigns:
  #- color
  #- balance
  #- buy
  #- sell
  #- trade
  #- free
  #- disposal
  #- warp
  #- kit
  #- mail
  #- enchant
  #- gamemode
  #- heal
  #- info
  #- spawnmob
  #- repair
  #- time
  #- weather
改为
enabledSigns:
  - color
  #- balance
  #- buy
  #- sell
  #- trade
  #- free
  #- disposal
  - warp
  - kit
  #- mail
  #- enchant
  #- gamemode
  #- heal
  #- info
  #- spawnmob
  #- repair
  #- time
  #- weather

replies.author: 假面骑士TX
replies.txt_content:
你是不是没装基础插件essentials= =
装了请检查有essentialschat这个插件
普通来说&在ess支持下就可以打木牌彩字
而且大部分插件都支持&

replies.author: Sobo
replies.txt_content: 你好楼主，服务器里面的&颜色前提是有Essentials插件，如果您有Ess插件我推荐你去看看此权限帖: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-445549-1-1.html 你可以找到文字颜色权限然后加上就行
